messages.content: Tell me everything you know about Xigbar.
Xigbar is a male orc in the Dungeons & Dragons universe. He is the leader of the Blackrock clan and the primary antagonist of the novel The Dark Legacy.
Wrong one, I meant from the Kingdom Hearts franchise.
Xigbar is the leader of the Blackrock clan and the main antagonist of the novel The Dark Legacy. He is also the primary antagonist of the Kingdom Hearts franchise.
